name: cave orc
dieMessage: a dying cave @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@orc@c-reset@ falls to the ground with a heavy thud.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ springs off a wall toward @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ swings his arms maniacally at @player-name@!

criticalAttackMessages.message: Before @player-name@ can react, @npc-color-name@ springs into the air and smashes both his fists into @player-name@, a @c-bold@@c-yellow@STUNNING@c-reset@ blow!
The @npc-color-name@ spins around and sends @player-name@ smashing into the cave wall, @player-name@ is completely disoriented!

battleMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ growls and hisses before swinging at @player-name@!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ lurks about in the jagged edges of the cave.
